name: Bugavengers
description:
Submission for the Game Off Jam by itch.io and Github.

INSTRUCTIONS
Control the bug by arrow keys/WASD
Possess the first robot you see in order to bug it and gain power
Use your power using spacebar

CREDITS
Development: Ranyolla GameDev 
SFX: Ali Raslan 
Music: Kevin MacLeod - incompetech.com 
Story: Ahmed Elamrawy
